summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the 2003 Fire Facilities and Emergency Response Levy Program, increasing appropriations to the Fleets and Facilities Department in the 2004 Budget; making a cash transfer from the Cumulative Reserve Subfund to the 2003 Fire Facilities Fund; creating and reclassifying positions; and authorizing the Fleets and Facilities Department to negotiate for the acquisition of real property; all by a three-fourths vote of the City Council.
note: Fire Facilities Levy Measure Implementation Ordinance
